name: Shrink Down - GGJ 2018 - 1 Hour Version
description:
You created an remoted controlled robot with a size modifier beam, but accidentaly shrunk yourself. Now you have to find a way to get your normal size back.

Move using arrow keys, press A to start game.

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/shrink-down

The game was made only in 1 hour, for the Final Countdown Diversifier.
